channel.title: Santa Cruz County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Santa Cruz County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: AZ-83 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on AZ-83 north. Distance to I-10.

item.title: AZ-83 North - Scenic Byway
item.description: AZ-83 North and Scenic Byway sign in Sonoita. AZ-83 is part of the Patagonia-Sonoita Scenic Road.

item.title: AZ-82 East Approaching AZ-83
item.description: AZ-82 east approaching AZ-83. Use AZ-83 north for I-10. Continue east on AZ-82 for SR-90. Turn right on county road for Parker Canyon Lake.

item.title: AZ-82 East - Sonoita
item.description: Entering Sonoita on AZ-82 East.

item.title: AZ-82 East - Patagonia City Limits
item.description: Patagonia City Limits on AZ-82 East.

item.title: AZ-82 East - Entering Patagonia
item.description: Entering Patagonia on AZ-82 East. Elevation 4050; Established 1898.

item.title: BL-19 North at AZ-82
item.description: BL-19 North at AZ-82 East - Nogales.

item.title: BL-19 North at AZ-82
item.description: BL-19 North at AZ-82 in Nogales. Turn left for AZ-82 east to Patagonia. Continue north on BL-19 for Tucson.

item.title: BL-19 North at AZ-82
item.description: BL-19 North at AZ-82 East to Railroad Overpass. The word railroad overpass is in both English and Spanish.

item.title: I-19 North - Crawford Ave./Sonoita Ave. Intersection
item.description: I-19 North (Crawford Ave.) at Sonoita Ave. Turn left on Sonoita Ave. for I-19 North/Tucson.

item.title: End I-19 South at BL-19/Grand Ave.
item.description: End I-19 South at BL-19/Grand Ave. in Nogales. Turn left for BL-19/Grand Ave. North. Turn right for Grand Ave. South Border Crossing to Mexico.

item.title: Grand Ave. North at Begin of I-19
item.description: Grand Ave. North at Begin of I-19 just north of Mexican border. Turn left for I-19 North to Tucson; continue straight for BL-19/Grand Ave. North.

item.title: I-19 South - Nogales City Limit
item.description: Nogales City Limit on I-19 south. Nogales is the county seat of Santa Cruz County.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 8
item.description: I-19 south approaching Exit 8 - Grand Ave. I-19 continues south towards the International Border with Mexico. Grand Ave. is the Nogales business loop.

item.title: I-19 South - Use Exit 8 For AZ-82
item.description: I-19 south approaching Exit 8. Use Exit 8 To AZ-82/East/Patagonia/Sonoita.

item.title: I-19 South - Nogales Exits
item.description: Nogales Exits on I-19 south. Distance to Grand Ave., AZ-189, and Western Ave.

item.title: I-19 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-19 south. Distance to Tumacacori, Jct. AZ-289, and Nogales.

item.title: I-19 South - Santa Cruz County
item.description: Entering Santa Cruz County on I-19 south.

item.title: AZ-82 East at AZ-83
item.description: AZ-82 east at AZ-83.

item.title: AZ-82 East Approaching AZ-83
item.description: AZ-82 east approaching AZ-83. Use AZ-83 north for I-10. Use AZ-83 south for Parker Canyon Lake.

item.title: AZ-82 East - Entering Patagonia
item.description: Entering Patagonia on AZ-82 East. Elevation 4,050. Founded in 1898.

item.title: Begin AZ-82 East
item.description: First AZ-82 shield eastbound.

item.title: BL-19 South at AZ-82
item.description: BL-19 south at AZ-82 east to Patagonia.

item.title: BL-19 South at I-19 and Border Crossing
item.description: BL-19 south at I-19 north to Tucson. Continue on BL-19 south for the border crossing into Mexico. This is the beginning of I-19.

item.title: I-19 at Crawford St. - Border Crossing Station
item.description: I-19 at Crawford St. Turn left on Crawford St. for the Border Crossing Station. There is a bilingual warning about bringing firearms and ammunition into Mexico.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 1A
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 1A - International St. I-19 continues towards the International Border with Mexico.

item.title: I-19 South Approaching Exit 1A
item.description: I-19 south approaching Exit 1A - International St. Freeway ends after Exit 1A in Downtown Nogales.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 1B
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 1B - Western Ave. I-19 continues south towards downtown Nogales.

item.title: AZ-189 North at I-19
item.description: AZ-189 north at I-19 onramp.

item.title: AZ-189 North Approaching I-19
item.description: AZ-189 north approaching I-19. Use I-19 south for the International Border. Use I-19 north for Tucson.

item.title: Border Corssing Status on AZ-189 South
item.description: Border crossing status on AZ-189 south for the truck border crossing. The port is currently open.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 4 and Exit 1B
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 4 - AZ-189 South/Border Truck Route. Approaching Exit 1B - Western Ave. The international border with Mexico is 6 km to the south via I-19.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 8
item.description: I-19 south approaching Exit 8 - Grand Ave. I-19 continues south towards the International Border with Mexico. Grand Ave. is the Nogales business loop.

item.title: I-19 South - Weapons Illegal In Mexico
item.description: Bilingual warning about prohibition of weapons and ammunition in Mexico on I-19 south. There is another warning further south on I-19.

item.title: I-19 South - Nogales Exits
item.description: Nogales Exits on I-19 south. Distance to Grand Ave., AZ-189, and Western Ave.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 12
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 12 - AZ-289/Pena Blanca Lake Recreational Area. The sign is colored brown.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 17
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 17 - Rio Rico Drive/Yavapai Drive.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 22
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 22 - Peck Canyon Road.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 25
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 25 - Palo Parado Road.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 29
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 29 - Tumacacori/Carmen.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 34
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 34 - Tubac.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 40
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 40 - Chavez Siding Road.

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 42
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 42 - Agua Linda Road.
